title: league client blacked out not even a start button

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: i got a new computer today and i can't get on league at all. when i open the client its just completely black no launch button or pictures, i can't use the cogwheel at the top i can only move it minimize it and close it. what do i do to fix this?

replies.body:
I'm having the same issue as well! I posted about this same issue but now my client turned white {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

Edit!!!

I finally figured it out!

Go to" C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects"
Delete the Folder called "lol_launcher"
Relaunch League of Legends
Patcher will download a new "lol_launcher"


here are the steps.
Had to dig into the old forums for this fix. http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3856920
I am currently patching.
did this work for you? i have tried this and it didn't make any difference to mine

I tried this a few days ago and it didn't work. ;-; 
League ran perfectly and smoothly until last week and I just re-installed it right now and still nothing.
yea i've tried so many different things and it won't work. i just dont understand how theres always so many problems with there client and launchers

I know... Mine has been like this for a week.
I've tried everything.
Kind of getting sick of it. :t
I was able to patch and get into a game but the minute champ select went off, I got bug splatted and im back at the black screen..
All you need to do is go to your files. Go to downloads. And delete the league of legends file. Click the league of legends app and it will work perfectly!
Also I might not work because your computer was on sleep. So just restart it and it also might work!
What worked for me, i deleted all the Lol_ air client folders and disabled my antiviruses and fire wall and it works nw

I had the same problem as you. All I did was go into my firewall and allow League of Legends through. Most of it says the LoL Patcher is allowed but it didn't list the League of Legends program itself. Try that
Had this problem last week, you have to disable your anti-virus. I have AVG. I temporarily disable it until restart and lol works. Hope this helps.
ok well i have tried basically everything that any forum post or video has offered for a solution and no change :\ guess i just cant play until riot decides to fix it

So I got it to work for me by deleting lol_launcher AND lol_patcher files in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects It redownloads some stuff, but im not getting the whitescreen/blackscreen on the patcher anymore. Try that.
the thing that bugs me most is how it works perfectly fine on my laptop which is overall worse then my desktop
